tasks.label: build
tasks.command: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars32.bat" && rc /fo matrix.res matrix.rc && cl /Fe:matrix.exe /MT /Zi /Od /DUNICODE /D_UNICODE /W4 /EHsc /TC src\main.c src\matrix.c /link /MACHINE:X86 user32.lib gdi32.lib kernel32.lib matrix.res && rename matrix.exe matrix.scr
